about_the_game:
Story

The game is set in a world where humanity is thrown into chaos due to an invasion of creatures from another realm. As a result, a mysterious force that defies scientific understanding emerges in the human world. Some humans with strong spiritual powers gain the ability to wield this unknown force, ultimately leading to the emergence of magical girls, who serve as demon hunters taking on various jobs to resolve supernatural disturbances.

The protagonist, FeiYin LingLing, is also a magical girl who has opened a shop called "Bunny Girl Bar" to accept commissions. However, her abilities are much weaker than those of other girls, and she can only manage to get by by running the rundown bar and taking on a few demon-hunting tasks.

About gameplay

  • Third-person shooter combined with some action elements. The protagonist can shoot magic bullets, throw rabbit bombs, or engage in melee attacks against enemies. Similarly, enemies also utilize ranged or melee abilities to counter the player.

  • Adopts a multi-level mode where players accept missions on the main interface and progressively clear levels. After completing levels, they can challenge higher difficulty settings.

  • For each level, there will be specially designed cover art with over 30 minutes of gameplay, as well as enemies with unique AI behaviors, waiting for players to challenge.

  • The levels will also include various collectible items, such as bomb types, bullet styles, and more.

  • Players can explore hidden areas on the map and defeat elite enemies to earn additional rewards.

Content display

name: Magic Honey ❥ Exorcism Shooter
short_description: The game is set in a world where humanity is thrown into chaos due to an invasion by creatures from another realm. As a magical girl, Mo Yin Ling Ling takes on commissions through her own establishment, the "Bunny Girl Bar," and resolves various supernatural disturbances across different locations.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
